snippet: Israel and the militant group Hamas seemed set on a collision course on Tuesday, with an escalation of cross-border clashes around the Gaza Strip.
abstract: Cross-border clashes around Gaza Strip escalate between Israel and militant group Hamas; Hamas vows to avenge deaths of six of its fighters and Israeli warplanes attack dozens of targets in the Palestinian territory.

byline.contributor: Fares Akram contributed reporting from Gaza, Said Ghazali from Jerusalem, and Nayef Hashlamoun from Hebron, West Bank.

lead_paragraph: Israel and the militant group Hamas seemed set on a collision course on Tuesday, with an escalation of cross-border clashes around the Gaza Strip.

headline.main: Israel Calls Up 1,500 Troops as Tensions Mount With Hamas
headline.print_headline: Calling Up More Troops, Israel Girds for an Escalation in Gaza Violence
